data.title: CommSEC - InterLINK products line (EN)
data.meta_description: CommSEC - InterLINK products line (EN) - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Eurogi S.r.l P.Iva 02886790019 – Via A.Casale 67 – 10100 Lessolo (TO) ITALY – (+39) 0125 58 859 eurogi@eurogi.it www.eurogi.it INTERLINK PROTOCOL Eurogi & CommSEC: the partnership Eurogi S.r.l. has established a partnership with CommSEC company in order to offer solutions to the customers with Eurogi devices, Eulogic gamma, in which are installed the firmware, developed by CommSEC, disposable in different licence versions. These firmware give to the devices the access by software application through InterLINK protocol on communication channels supported. For further details please visit CommSEC website - www.commsec.it -. CommSEC: InterLINK protocol The protocol consist of operative text messages, ASCII formatted, organized in sets of commad and its parameters. The protocol syntax is very simple and easy to learn and the text format is very useful for the software application to develop. Communication channels Software applications communicate with hardware architecture to manage through InterLINK protocol on the following channels: • Serial Terminal RS-232 or RS-485 or Serial-USB • Ethernet / Internet through TELNET Terminal and through Web-Browser HTTP • Ethernet / Internet TCP/IP protocol Software applications InterLINK protocol is utilized by software applications that implement the automation. These applications could be local, near the installed devices, or remote in whatever place reachble by data connectivity. The application developing is very simple thanks to the string text based protocol: is only necessary sending text string on serial or ethernet channel. Example of common platforms and languages utilizable: LabView, Java, .Net, Python, Javascript, Processing. InterLINK protocol examples of text string: • reading “_RI,0,2,4_ ” • writing “_WH,0,4,3,128,x80,sAB_“ Applications • software Hardware devices • browser Communication channels • Eurogi Eulogic devices with • USB monitor • USB pre-installed InterLINK firmware • Telnet prompt • Ethernet • different firmware licences • Modbus offer different functionalities

2. Eurogi S.r.l P.Iva 02886790019 – Via A.Casale 67 – 10100 Lessolo (TO) ITALY – (+39) 0125 58 859 eurogi@eurogi.it www.eurogi.it INTERLINK SERVER FIRMWARE LICENCE InterLINK Server firmware licence offers all the device internal resources to the InterLINK protocol and so to the software applications that use it. Available resources are: Input and Output, Display and push-buttons events, RTC, internal memory, etc.. The device must only be configured with necessary parameters to establish InterLINK connections ( like IP address, logging server, etc.). Software applications can access, through communication channels, at all the device functionalities. For further details please visit CommSEC website - www.commsec.it -. input ex. temperature sensor software application ex. Java device with InterLINK Server Firmware ex. Camillo Verde communication channel ex. InterLINK on Ethernet output ex. relay actuator for switch on/off conditioner ex. reading input 2 state (temperature sensor value) ex. setting output 4 activating 230 VAC load (a conditioner) ex. interaction in function of the push-buttom 3 pressed event ex. sending alarm with text on display activating backlit and buzzer sound
